pkgmetadata.longdescription: teapot is a python library and a command-line tool that eases thedownloading, the unpacking and the building of third-party softwares in aproject.teapot comes with the command-line tool `teapot` that does all thenecessary work.teapot is designed with extension in mind, which means it is very easyto add your own modules and extend its scope.
